name: Flip Edge HD
description:
*Apps On Sale* Get one now while it lasts! Thank You For Playing! Enjoy! :)
The simplest focus game to rule them all is here! Follow the Blue One and let's see how far can you go. Game over when the red one's out! Can you track that fast? Can you follow that doubled speed? Flip Edge HD is here!
- Sale Sale Sale!
- No Ads
- No In App Purchases
- No micro transactions
- No additional downloads/No internet requirements to play
- Very small file size, consumes less memory and supports older iOS devices

Enjoy my latest game!


Visit sites here:
https://m.facebook.com/getemilio/
https://m.facebook.com/reddstudiosapps/
https://itunes.apple.com/us/developer/ranz-ursal/id1116871834


Thank you for downloading and enjoy.
